name: market for tinplate scrap, sorted | tinplate scrap, sorted | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23560/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'tinplate scrap, sorted', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This market activity represents the transport requirements of 1 kg of 'tinplate scrap, sorted' from sorting to recycling activities within the global geography.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'tinplate scrap, sorted' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation.

This activity ends with the provision of 1 kg of 'tinplate scrap, sorted' to the activities treating this product. Transport is included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent the market activities of this product within the global geography.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average transport requirements used to deliver products within the global geography.
